logic

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Actor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Collidable, Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camera, Chalice, EnemySpawner, Movable, PlayerSpawn, Tile

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable, java.io.Serializable, Collidable
    An actor is a thing which can act and "is" on the game map. It can be updated, collided with, also can be saved and loaded in. The game map also contains actors, which then can be handled in a common space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
